name: Hank Pym
text: You can only change form by card abilities. Scientist Supreme — Action: Spend 1 [mental] resource → place 1 pym counters on a Size Manipulation. If you cannot, seek a copy of Size Manipulation upgrade from your deck and put it into play. “insert quote.”

name: Wasp
text: You can only change form by card abilities. Bumble Bee — Response: After you change to this form, confuse a minon. You may spend a [mental] resource → confuse the villain instead. “This is my GOOD COP impression.”

name: Wasp
text: You can only change form by card abilities. Man-Mountain — Response: After you change to this form, stun a minon. You may spend a [physical] resource → stun the villain instead. “This is my GOOD COP impression.”

name: Ant-Man
text: [star] Ant-Man gets +1 ATK and +1 THW for each pym counter on him (to a maximum of +3 TW+HW and +3 ATK.). Action: Exhaust a Size Manipulation → move 1 pym counter from it to here. Action: Discard this card → change form. “It's time to play hero! For a little while at least.”

name: Gigantification
text: Play only if you are in [[tiny]] hero form. Hero Action (attack): Change to [[giant]] hero form. Deal 4 damage to an enemy, ignoring the guard keyword. Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, change to [[giant]] hero form. Give your hero a tough status card.

name: Resize at Will
text: Action: Change form. Then, if you are in:

name: Self-Shrinking
text: Play only if you are in [[giant]] hero form. Hero Action (thwart): Change to [[tiny]] hero form. Remove 3 threat from a scheme, ignoring the patrol keyword. Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy initiates an attack against you, change to [[tiny]] hero form and cancel that attack.

name: Pym Particles
text: Response: After you spend this card, ready each Size Manipulation upgrade you control and place a total of 2 pym counters on them. If no pym counters were placed this way, change form.

name: Infinite Avengers Mansion
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card → place 1 pym counter on a card you control and shuffle 1 identity-specific card from your discard pile into your deck. “My god...This place goes on forever.” —Stature

name: Jocasta
text: Wasp gets +1 THW. Alter-ego Response: After you change to alter-ego form, ready your identity. (Limit once per phase.) “Because of you, I believe in the impossible.” —Hank Pym

name: Bio-Synthetic Wings
text: While you are in [[tiny]] hero form, Wasp gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust this card → remove X threat from among schemes, where X is equal to the number of times you have changed form this turn. “EMBIGGEN!” —Ms. Marvel

name: Huge Surprise
text: Hero Action: Discard this card → choose an enemy. Until the end of the round, the chosen enemy loses steady and stalwart. After that enemy is stunned or confused, it takes 4 damage. “PSYCH!” —Wasp

name: Size Manipulation
text: Enters play with 2 pym counters on it. Resource: Exhaust this card and remove 1 pym counter from here → generate a [wild] resource. Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 pym counter from here → change form. “EMBIGGEN!” —Ms. Marvel

name: The Stinger
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust this card → deal 1+X damage divided among enemies you choose, where X is equal to the number of times you have changed form this turn. “The Stinger. It focuses my bio-energy into a powerful stun beam” —Wasp
